2026-02-22.skipped: Microsoft.Build 17.11.4 (has known CVEs GHSA-w3q9-fxm7-j8fq, GHSA-h4j7-5rxr-p4wc) - needs compatibility check with FAKE

7.0.0.description: Updated 7.0.0 Unreleased section with bug fixes: #1508, #1453, #1230, #1356, #1509/#1223, #946

maintainer_instructions: Issue #1509 submitter says the fix in PR #1510 does NOT resolve the issue (from dsyme comment 2026-02-21)
dsyme endorsed fixing issue #1310 (EmbeddedResource + Schema/GetSchema bug) on 2026-02-22
dsyme endorsed StrictBooleans parameter for CsvProvider in issue #1417 (2024-03-11)

notes.issue_1509: Closed by dsyme on 2026-02-22 (PR #1605 merged fixed it)
notes.issue_1330: HTML whitespace-stripping bug - complex to fix, needs context-aware inline/block detection
notes.issue_1310: FIXED in PR #1619 - GetSchema now reads from embedded resource at runtime when EmbeddedResource is specified. dsyme endorsed fix on 2026-02-22.
notes.issue_1439: InferRows truncates text lines not CSV rows - workaround: InferRows=0
notes.issue_1251: HTTP default encoding is ISO-8859-1 per RFC; workaround is responseEncodingOverride='utf-8'
notes.issue_1256: CSV Load(Stream) ignores encoding by design; workaround is TextReader overload
notes.issue_1261: CLOSED by dsyme 2026-02-22 (JsonValue.Parse handles all root JSON types)
notes.issue_677: CLOSED by dsyme 2026-02-21 (JSON Schema shipped in 6.5.0)
notes.issue_1322: By design: missing array field uses empty array not Option. Workaround: use 'data: null' in sample to get Option<Datum[]>
notes.issue_1383: CSS pseudo-class error fix PR #1613 created - throw NotSupportedException instead of generic Exception
notes.issue_1419: Stack overflow on circular XSD group references. Root cause: XsdInference.fs line 186 - XmlSchemaGroupRef handling has no cycle guard. Fix: track visited group names/refs. Commented 2026-02-22.
notes.issue_1437: xs:dateTime without timezone fix: ConvertDateTimeOffset now falls back to AsDateTime when AsDateTimeOffset returns None. PR #1617 created 2026-02-22. All 249 tests pass.
notes.issue_1452: XSD Choice maps to tuple-of-Options due to type erasure - can't emit real DUs. Commented 2026-02-22 with XElement workaround.
notes.issue_1488: XmlProvider emits per-element types not per-XSD-type. Fix: XsdInference.fs needs to group elements by type= attribute and emit single F# type per complexType. Breaking change. Commented 2026-02-22.
notes.issue_1465: JsonProvider writable properties: erased TPs make this hard. Workaround via JsonValue.Properties mutation exists. Commented 2026-02-22 with immutable-copy alternative.
notes.issue_1432: XmlProvider renames elements to be F#-idiomatic. dsyme endorsed adding option to preserve names. Added help wanted label 2026-02-22.
notes.issue_1417: IMPLEMENTED in branch repo-assist/feature-strict-booleans-1417. StrictBooleans=true: 0/1->int, yes/no->string, true/false->bool. PR created 2026-02-22. Tests: 251/251 pass.
notes.issue_1436: Trimmability for Blazor WASM. Commented 2026-02-22 explaining DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation requirement and path forward.
notes.issue_1340: Commented 2026-02-22: F# 6.0+ includes fix for #r nuget design-time resolution; Load uses runtime cwd by design; use Path.Combine(__SOURCE_DIRECTORY__, ...) for runtime paths.
notes.microsoft_build_vulns: Microsoft.Build 17.11.4 has CVEs GHSA-w3q9-fxm7-j8fq and GHSA-h4j7-5rxr-p4wc. PR #1618 created by a separate Copilot workflow to update them.
notes.pr_1618_note: PR #1618 is from a SEPARATE Copilot workflow (copilot/update-microsoft-build-packages), not from Repo Assist. It addresses #1615.
notes.release_status: Last GitHub release 6.3.0 (Sep 2023). RELEASE_NOTES.md has 6.4.0-6.6.0 and 7.0.0 Unreleased. Release prep PR #1616 created 2026-02-22 for 7.0.0.
notes.issue_backlog: All open issues triaged as of 2026-02-22. Reset cursor to null - start fresh next run.
notes.recently_closed_by_dsyme: Issues closed by dsyme on 2026-02-22: #1532, #1528, #1509, #1506, #1501, #1249, #1261; on 2026-02-21: #677. Likely prompted by Repo Assist comments.
notes.pr_windows_ci_failures: PRs #1613 and #1614 have Windows CI failures due to Kestrel socket 10013 (WSAEACCES) on port binding. Infrastructure issue, not code. Linux builds pass. Commented on both PRs 2026-02-22.
notes.strict_booleans_impl: StrictBooleans feature impl: post-process in CsvInference.inferCellType - Bit0/Bit1->int, bool from non-true/false->string. Positional param between inferenceMode and cultureInfo in inferColumnTypes. Static param at index 17 in CsvProvider. TypeProviderInstantiation.fs also updated.
